definition: (bird species of China) bridled tern (Onychoprion anaethetus)
brown/gray or dark color/coarse hemp cloth/Taiwan pr. [he2]

Yan, a vassal state of Zhou in modern Hebei and Liaoning/north Hebei/the four Yan kingdoms of the Sixteen Kingdoms, namely: Former Yan 前燕 (337-370), Later Yan 後燕|后燕 (384-409), Southern Yan 南燕 (398-410), Northern Yan 北燕 (409-436)/surname Yan

sentences.english: The cracks behind the man was in fact an ideal nesting site for Bridled Terns (see photo below).
sentences.chinese: 其實那人身後的巖罅是褐翅燕鷗的理想巢位。
